name: Williams Propane Comfort 30K BTU Wall Heater
description: This Williams Blue Flame 30,000 BTU Wall Propane Heater is fueled by propane gas and features a thermostat to help keep your room at a consistent, comfortable temperature. It has a Piezo ignition for quick and easy igniting, and an automatic shutoff feature for your peace of mind. The heater can be mounted on the surface of your wall, or you can opt for recessed installation.Produces 30,000 BTU per hour for powerful indoor heatingDesigned to heat an area up to 1,000 sq. ft.Fueled by propane gas for effective heatingPiezo ignition aids in a quick start timeBuilt-in thermostat helps you control and maintain your desired temperatureDial controls are simple and easy to useAutomatic shutoff helps provide peace of mindSoft white color blends in with many types of decorChoose between recessed and surface-mounted installation to suit your design needsCSA listed and ANSI certifiedEquipment should be sized, selected and installed by a qualified professional to ensure proper installation, safe operation, adherence to federal, state and local codes and for valid warranty; see installation guide for more detailsRecommended for professional purchase onlyClick here for more informationHome Depot Protection Plan:
